org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.couchdb.dialect.model.impl

Class CouchDBAssociation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.couchdb.dialect.model.impl.CouchDBAssociation

  • public abstract class CouchDBAssociation
extends Object
    Represents an association stored in CouchDB, backed either by an association document (external storage of associations) or an association sub-tree within an entity document (embedded storage of associations).

    The owning document must be written back to CouchDB to make changes to the rows of an association persistent in the data store.

    Author:
    Gunnar Morling

                                         AssociationKeyMetadata associationKeyMetadata)
        Creates a CouchDBAssociation from the given EntityDocument and association name.

        entity - the owner of the association
        associationKeyMetadata - association key meta-data
        Returns:
        a CouchDBAssociation representing the association

      • fromAssociationDocument

        Creates a CouchDBAssociation from the given AssociationDocument.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a CouchDBAssociation of the given AssociationDocument

      • getRows

        public abstract List<Object> getRows()
        Get all the rows of this association. Does not contain columns which are part of the association key.
        Returns:
        a list with all the rows for this association

      • setRows

        public abstract void setRows(List<Object> rows)
        Sets the rows of this association. The given list must not contain columns which are part of the association key.
        Parameters:
        rows - the rows of the association

      • getOwningDocument

        public abstract Document getOwningDocument()
        Returns the CouchDB document which owns this association, either an AssociationDocument or an EntityDocument.
        Returns:
        the Document representing the owner of the association
